pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
TRANSFORMING TO A HYBRID WORKPLACE​​​​​​​

Helping you work when and where you're at your best

{"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "97257ec4-4a92-4b20-af51-dd38a3eb883d", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":16}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: In preparation for returning to the office, we will help you adopt hybrid workplace practices to ensure your health, over all well-being, and success. Over the next several months we will adopt new workplace habits, skills, and policies that ensure we can continue doing our best work in a more flexible way. Your health and well-being is our top concern, and you will see we have invested in learning from people within our organization and industry experts to develop training resources and a support network to ensure your success.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What's happening

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "f70bdf9c-04ef-4863-962f-1eaca4725153", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The world has changed, and now the way we work together will change too. ​​​​​​​
More than ever, we must be flexible and forward-thinking in our approach to how we get work done at Contoso. Over the next several months, we will transform to a hybrid workplace.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "07217723-ce67-43bb-b5a8-961f1528c917", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Hybrid workplace factors will impact how we:​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

➜ Sustain productivity

➜ Communicate and collaborate with teams

➜ Create community and culture

➜ Practice data privacy and security measures

➜ Create hybrid work plans with managers

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What's next
Jump start your hybrid workplace journey today.

Get started by watching Patti Fernandez speak about Contoso's approach to adopting a hybrid workplace. Then, review the hybrid workplace checklist to get a sense of the big picture. Finally, attend an upcoming event to learn more and get hands on experience with new tools.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What you'll learn
New skills and habits ensure your well-being and success.
We've worked closely with internal partners and experts to curate training, resources, and a support network to ensure you've got the tools you need to reach your goals.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: When you think about a hybrid workplace, think flexibility

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "78f7e540-f628-4e6a-a8cb-d663dd215d0f", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As we navigate our way through understanding how to adopt hybrid work and begin to return to worksites, you'll see our workplace transform into a hybrid work environment that better supports the productivity, health, and well-being of all Contoso employees over the next several months. Our goal is to ensure Contoso employees' well-being and the ability to sustain an ideal work-life balance. To get to our goal, we will provide training, tools, and support so you can feel confident and informed as we adopt this new way of working together.
New hybrid workplace practices will impact how you:

➜ Plan and manage your schedule

➜ Balance work and life priorities

➜ Sustain workplace productivity

➜ Communicate and collaborate with team members

➜ Engage in creating community and culture

➜ Approach sensitive data, privacy, and security practices

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What is a hybrid workplace?

A hybrid workplace is designed to be flexible in when and where you work. New hybrid workplace policies offer more options on approved worksite locations and regular working hours in order to ensure your well-being. New policies allow for team members to work from home up to 50% of the time and, depending on your role, there is additional guidance on how to adjust regular working hours.
A hybrid workplace is one that allows flexibility in where and when you work.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: THE FUTURE OF WORK IS FORWARD THINKING
We are dedicated to supporting new ways of working around sustained productivity, workplace collaboration, and data security. ​​​​​​​

Hybrid work is designed to ensure a cohesive and collaborative workplace experience that delivers on our specific personnel and business needs. Options around where and when employees work may differ based on role or region and should be discussed with your manager.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "463dcdcc-e8db-41e6-89ea-067d1daabf49", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: COMMITTED TO FLEXIBILITY​​​​​​​
Flexibility is the cornerstone of our hybrid workplace because it enables every employee to do their best work without making sacrifices to their well-being or personal lives.

➜ Welcomes and enables diverse workstyles

➜ Considers business needs and individual needs

➜ Built on mutual trust and enabled by technology​​​​​​​

➜ Enables remote work up to 50% of the time

➜ Provides flexibility around regular working hours

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What's changing?

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "f461100f-1fb5-46fe-97ca-3b14ad8005af", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: NEW COMPANY POLICIES

In efforts to create and sustain a hybrid work model that's beneficial to all employees, we are adjusting company policies, providing additional training and support for critical workplace functions, establishing strategic communication channels, and expanding health benefits to ensure you are set up for success.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "493c051e-3398-478e-9cc1-7e9bc5000655", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: EXPANDED BENEFITS AND PERKS

➜ Flexible working hours and scheduled focus time

➜ Wellness resource library and ergonomic services

➜ New methods and tools for collaboration

➜ Expanded home office equipment benefits

➜ Support networks and training events​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Why it’s important we make these changes

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "0220edb3-75c3-4cb0-9d6a-ca523593cad0", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The changes we have outlined are being driven by our commitment to providing the best employee experience possible so that our teams can do their best work. Changes are also being driven by the local health and safety guidelines in combination with advice from productivity experts and feedback from internal team members.
Our primary goal is to keep employees healthy & productive.

The new changes that make a hybrid workplace possible will require time and dedication to changing workplace habits for the greater good. If we fail to keep each other healthy and productive, we won’t be able to sustain our business or continue helping our customers see the world from a new perspective.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What to expect

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "925beb04-5b46-4a06-a91a-9677eb074e12", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
How the new hybrid workplace model works:

​​​​​​​

Flexibility

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​Help employees to work when and where they are at their best

✚

Technology

Equip employees with new well-being and productivity skills and tools

✚

New habits

Establish new ways of communicating, collaborating, and building culture

=

New hybrid workplace

Leaders and managers alike endorse the new hybrid work culture and expect that you may need to reprioritize work to accommodate training expectations. Your manager will be scheduling 1:1 time with you to develop your hybrid work plan.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "6a806d51-128d-44fd-9d9c-b10e6763abf9", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Checklist of activities to help employees prepare for and make a successful transition to the hybrid workplace.

Ongoing communications and updates about how the transition is tracking, feedback from the internal team members, and rewards and recognition of those who have adopted hybrid workplace habits.

Support and communication channels that will be moderated regularly by hybrid workplace champions to identify roadblocks, questions, concerns, and general feedback about new hybrid workplace activities and expectations.

Training sessions and knowledge checks will be one component of the change process to adopting a new hybrid model to ensure all employees have the right tools and skills to stay well and be productive.

Opportunities to explore, practice, and use new hybrid workplace tools and skills by attending optional office hours events or using dedicated training time to learn at your own pace.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: To learn and grow into your new hybrid workplace skillset, we are providing multiple touch points:

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
➊​​​​​​​ 
TOWN HALL KICKOFF

Join us live or watch the recorded kickoff discussion at the all company Town hall. Learn how to prepare for our return to the office, what to expect on your first day back in the office, and the new hybrid workplace adoption plan.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "e6a05c3b-b0ef-4d8f-a682-aa9bdb0f7302", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
➋​​​​​​​ 
HANDS-ON EXPERIENCE

Complete training modules and then get real, hands-on experience with tools. We'll help you understand how to sustain productivity and well-being, collaborate with others while in and out of the office, and how to manage data security.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
➌
DEVELOP YOUR NEW SKILLS

Attend an upcoming event or take advantage of supplemental resources to help you sustain and further develop your new skills. Throughout the process, we will ask for your feedback to ensure the new hybrid training and support resources are meeting your needs.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Use the hybrid workplace checklist to get a sense of the big picture
What's coming up & what's next:
Using research from experts and insights from Contoso employees, we've created a comprehensive readiness program that involves a variety of methods and touch points.​​​​​​​
Our goal is to provide the right tools and resources at the right time to help you learn and adopt new skills at a pace that works for you. ​​​​​​​

➜ Training: Learn about new practices and skills to ensure well-being, productivity, and more

➜ Tasks: Practice using new skills and habits by completing specific tasks

➜ Quiz: Complete knowledge checks periodically to ensure you have the information you need​​​​​​​

➜ Events: Attend special training events to see live demonstrations and get hands on experience

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: You've got a community of support

We are all adopting hybrid workplace habits and skills together. Each one of us faces a unique challenge depending on our job function, team dynamic, and personal life. Lean on your hybrid workplace community to help you remove barriers and see new ways of working.

Use the hybrid workplace community to connect, get support, and learn something new.

➜ Find support for critical hybrid workplace tools like ergonomic home office equipment 

➜ Quickly share praise for people who have inspired you and others to grow 

➜ Start a discussion about your hybrid workplace experience and tips and tricks that have helped you be successful

➜ Ask your peers and colleagues about how they have solved hybrid workplace challenges

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Frequently asked questions

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "09f2b09d-e81d-4287-ad14-6340fad37371", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":48}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Why are we adopting hybrid workplace practices?

The way the world gets work done has fundamentally changed over the last year. Many organizations like ourselves are choosing a new path forward that makes sure employees stay healthy, feel engaged, and can do their best work. Review new hybrid work policies around worksite location and working hours with your manager to learn more about how you can make adjustment so that you are empowered to work when and where you are at your best.

Why can’t we work from home 100% of the time instead of adopting a hybrid model?

Research shows that some physical connectivity to our teams and sharing meeting and workspace is ideal to maintain team culture, build relationships, and brainstorm complex ideas. We have also learned that some meetings are just more effective in-person. To ensure your success, we believe a balance of working from home and working in the office is the best approach.

What is my role in adopting hybrid workplace practices?

Your role is to approach this new journey with optimism, empathy, and dedication. Adopting new workplace habits and skills will take time, and everyone will move at a different pace. Want to get more involved in hybrid workplace adoption? Consider becoming a hybrid workplace champion.

How long is this transition going to take?

We believe the transition will happen in phases. The first major shift will take several months. As we learn and grow together, we will know more about what kind of long-term support and policies will be best for the organization. The most up to date information on hybrid workplace adoption will be available in the hybrid workplace portal.

Where should I get started?

Start by watching our CEO Patti Fernandez share her approach to leading Contoso through this journey. Then, review the hybrid workplace checklist to get a sense of the big picture. Finally, learn about the support networks available to you and RSVP to an upcoming learning opportunity.

How many training sessions do I need to attend?

There are three core training topics: Well-being and productivity, meetings and collaboration, and security and data protection. All three topics are required training, however most of the mandatory training can be done independently, either from the office or from home. Learning opportunities like hybrid workplace champions events are highly encouraged but optional to attend.

How long will it take to complete the training sessions?

Each training session has been designed so that you can quickly pause and pick up so that micro-learning opportunities can take place in your workflow. Each of the three training sessions can be completed in less than 90 minutes.

Who can help answer questions?

We have built several new support channels to help guide you through this transition.

  • For quick questions and answers, use the hybrid workplace community chat
  • For complex questions or 1:1 help, reach out to the hybrid workplace champions community
  • For questions regarding worksite and working hours, refer to your manager

Where can I go for extra help?

Its highly recommended that you attend one of the many upcoming events that will offer additional training opportunities outside of the required training modules that will include live demonstrations, best practices, and “Ask me anything” style events with the hybrid workplace champions community.

Are there any changes to benefits?

Yes, there have been adjustments to our core set of benefits that expand to include ergonomic home office equipment, wellness services, and even childcare services to make sure you have the support you need to stay healthy and do your best work. Learn more about expanded benefits and perks.

How do I request a change to my work location or regular working hours?

Start by letting your manager know you are considering adjusting your worksite and working hours. Make sure you are aligned to expectations around these adjustments.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Make a difference. Become a Champion.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "522ca2b6-6d51-45d5-8928-4a64e4b0fa99", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Champions help build, grow, and sustain our transition to the new hybrid workplace by evangelizing and helping their peers acquire new skills and habits. Champions help set the tone of organizational transformation and can be influential when sharing feedback and ideas on how to improve workplace functions. Champions are passionate about driving organizational change and using their unique skillset to help others succeed.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Invest in yourself by investing in others

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "dc1a3795-963a-47f6-878c-bc54386e2719", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: PERSONAL & PROFESSIONAL GROWTH

When you commit to championing a cause, you commit to taking on a leadership role to support and guide others through change. By doing so, you will experience personal and professional growth that will help you reach your own future ambitions.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "eb168979-3fa6-450d-b793-07f5938a9dc4", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: BENEFITS OF BECOMING A CHAMPION​​​​​​​
Make an impact by accelerating adoption of the practices and technology necessary for our workplace transformation.

➜ Build a circle of influence with peers and leaders

➜ Participate in identifying business challenges and share ideas on potential solutions

➜ Provide feedback to executive sponsors, project leads, and organizational leaders

➜ Get recognized by your peers and leaders for helping Contoso become a hybrid workplace

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Champion program support

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "1ad8cfe6-71a6-4400-b139-b598aa664f44", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: SPEND YOUR TIME HELPING OTHERS

Champions need organizational buy-in and support to be successful. We have created a champion support network that will enable you to spend your time helping others rather than writing communications or planning training sessions. We are committed to providing champions with tools, resources, and even coordination support.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "33539545-7402-4594-89f6-879d63811796", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT AS A CHAMPION

➜ Regular champion-peer networking and sharing

➜ Expert training on the best practices and technology to succeed in our new hybrid workplace

➜ Recognition for your impact helping your colleagues work better and thrive in our new hybrid workplace

➜ Resources you can use to help your colleagues accelerate their adoption

➜ Regular email communications such as community topics, latest news, tips and resources

➜ Access to the subject matter experts at Contoso who are leading our workplace transformation

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What's expected of champions

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "a5f3ab1d-bd87-4e11-b6f6-d74b25b3425f", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: SHORT TERM COMMITMENTS, LONG TERM BENEFITS

To create effective champions, we need to invest time into champion training to ensure the organization is ready to support the upcoming changes. While there is no minimum time commitment, it is expected that by becoming a champion, you will be available to participate in certain events and meetings.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "7d695034-61f8-48fc-b5ab-5c6e65bea1bd", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: CHAMPION COMMITMENTS

➜ Attend the champions kick-off meeting

➜ Participate in the Contoso champion network by contributing to weekly community calls and answering questions in Yammer conversations

➜ Provide your peers with planned and informal learning opportunities and resources that will ensure their success in our new hybrid workplace

➜ Share the successes of your peers with leadership, organizational managers, and the broader organization

➜ Share the feedback and resistance you are hearing from colleagues that you engage with to the program owners so improvements can be made

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Hybrid workplace tips and resources for managers

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "df1884f5-d049-4304-b8a7-86106ab0d3ab", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":16}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Managers play a big role in our transition to the hybrid workplace and will need extra support to effectively lead teams. We've worked with experts and researchers to develop training and support materials to equip and empower managers with new skills and tools.
Tips and resources will help you:

➜ Maintain consistent communication with your team using asynchronous methods

➜ Learn how to build and maintain team culture in the hybrid workplace

➜ Understand how to recruit team talent and onboard new team members

➜ Explore new hybrid worksite and working hours policies and guidelines​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Tips for managers

Its important that managers create a trusted space for team members to connect and share experiences, offer support, and align on commitments. ​Review manager-specific tips to help you enable your team for success while maintaining team culture.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: HOST A DAILY OR SEMI-WEEKLY TEAM CHECK IN

Give your team a chance to feel seen and heard. Regular team check-ins establish a “rhythm” to replace the old way of going to the office and a feeling of connectedness. Consider asking people to stand-up during this meeting to encourage physical movement and keep the meeting short.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: PRIORITIZE WORK TOGETHER

Help employees identify work that is the most critical, what can wait, and what they can delegate. Identifying and organizing tasks together builds a sense of teamwork while simultaneously helping managers and team members sync on the latest projects.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: KEEP REGULAR 1:1s

Use 1:1 time to really check in and connect on a human level first, as opposed to jumping into work deliverables right away. If you are trying to balance the amount of meetings you are in, consider scheduling 1:1s that are 15 minutes long.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: MAKE TIME FOR CREATIVE COLLABORATION

Create parallel work opportunities that allow team members to collaborate on the same project while working independently to foster a sense of togetherness. Consider scheduling a weekly afternoon meeting where each team member keeps their video on while working independently on a shared project.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: CREATE A TEAM COMMUNICATION CONTRACT

Get your team on the same page in terms of how you want to communicate and expectations around how to interact with each other in meetings. Creating a communication contract in and of itself is a great team-building activity and helps teams learn more about each other.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "2161a1c6-db61-4731-b97c-3cdb303f7cbb", "instanceId": "b9cf20e0-1dc9-4d1a-99a4-5e8871ff4d0a", "title": "Divider", "description": "Add a line to divide areas on your page.", "dataVersion": "1.1", "properties": {"length":100,"weight":1}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: EXAMPLE TOPICS FOR TEAM CONTRACTS:

➜ Is our team okay with spontaneous video calls? 

➜ Is our team okay with spontaneous audio calls? 

➜ If your status is set to Do Not Disturb, should I avoid messaging you, or is it okay to message but have the expectation that you will not reply immediately? 

➜ Do you prefer email or a Teams chat message? When do you prefer one over the other? 

➜ ​​​​​​​In group meetings, do we raise our hand or can we jump in whenever?

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: A MESSAGE FROM CONTOSO'S PRESIDENT
I would like to begin by thanking all of you. Contoso team members have risen to the enormous challenges brought upon by the pandemic.

The past several months have challenged us like never before, but your resiliency, flexibility, and resolve have been critical to helping Contoso, our partners, and our customers through these unprecedented times. The pandemic has fundamentally changed how we all live, learn, and work. As we begin to recover from the pandemic and plan our return to the office, the leadership team has been challenged with the task of rethinking how we get work done at Contoso. After speaking to many of you, as well as experts and other organizations, we are ready to share our learnings. These insights shape our new way of working.
We will continue to collaborate with team members and experts to make our hybrid workplace even better over time. Regardless of where we are working, we will always be One Contoso.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Looking forward

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The future of work at Contoso is flexible and forward-thinking

We are committed to new ways of working that align to our culture, create enduring connections, promote inclusion, and offer as much flexibility to all of you as possible. While employees and their managers need to work out what flexibility means specifically for them, my expectation is that we should enable a hybrid workplace where individuals, teams and our business can be successful.
Options around where and when employees work may vary depending on role and region.

Work site

➜ Enabling employees to have flexibility regarding their work site, specifically the option to work from home up to 50% of work time per week.

Work hours

➜ Enabling employees to have flexibility regarding their work schedules and the times of day when they work.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Our priorities

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "8a7369a2-0161-42f7-9c96-7f977eabffdb", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: It is going to take a collective effort to make the hybrid workplace successful at Contoso. Think of the hybrid workplace as a journey rather than a destination for now.

Sustaining your well-being

While remote work offers many advantages, it does come with some potential downsides that need to be managed. Chief among them is our well-being, the potential for burnout, a blurring of work and life boundaries, and social isolation.


Take advantage of our increased fitness benefits, stay connected with your colleagues, and take care of yourself and your family.​​​​​​​

​​​​​​​

For myself, on days when I work remotely, I take one meeting where I don’t need to be in front of my computer so I can call into the meeting from my mobile device and walk around my block for an hour. I have also asked all leadership at Contoso to lean in and help employees prioritize their work, ensure a good 1:1 cadence, and establish agreed upon focus time where no meetings will be scheduled.

Ensuring strong collaboration

We must not lose the One Contoso approach where we work across teams and products to develop the best solutions that delight our customers. Use your days in the office strategically to not only catch up with colleagues but for meetings that require brainstorming, influencing, or building new relationships. You’ll learn more about how to enhance collaboration in the new hybrid workplace using productivity tools and best practices.  ​​​​​​​

Maintaining our culture

We have an amazing culture at Contoso and I want to make sure that flourishes as part of our new way of working. I will be publishing a monthly blog where I will highlight great examples of the One Contoso culture lived by you and an on-demand video updates of important Contoso news. Additionally, in upcoming Town Halls I’ll share our collective progress, insights, and feedback. ​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Recognize teams who have gone above and beyond in helping others adopt new skills and habits. Add details and highlights that make this team feel acknowledged and appreciated.


Example:

The commercial marketing team has set a great example of what it looks like to respond and grow during times of change. The commercial marketing team has created asynchronous collaboration channels that have reduced and replaced 20% of reoccurring meetings. Additionally, team members report feeling better support and connected after having gone through the teams agreements exercise. 

You've inspired those around you to commit to new hybrid workplace practices to sustain productivity and collaboration while ensuring the health and wellness of your team mates.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Recognize individuals who have gone above and beyond in helping others adopt new skills and habits. Add details and highlights that make this person feel acknowledged and appreciated.


Example:

The hybrid workplace champion community is full of people who have embraced this new way of working and want to help others do the same, so it takes a tremendous amount of effort and dedication to stand out in the group.

Megan Bowen has been nominated by her peers and colleagues for champion of the month. Megan's peers have been inspired by her leadership in establishing the weekly champion-lead event series, notably the workshop she hosted that helps managers lead their teams to develop team agreements.

⭐ Way to go Megan!

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Diego Siciliani shares Contoso's new hybrid workplace at HR Conference

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "e0ea8a28-fe20-478f-87c1-7f8b7b93f503", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":16}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: One small step for Contoso, one large step for the workplace

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "f117d2ad-e399-4c84-b025-078defe6329e", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Diego Siciliani - HR Manager - has been instrumental in developing and implementing our hybrid workplace strategy. Diego has helped write our new hybrid work policies, designed our employee adoption program, and advised managers on the best ways to support employee wellbeing. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

At last week's annual HR Conference, Diego showcased Contoso's hybrid work model as a case study example to his HR peers across various companies and industries. The model was received very well and is being considered as one of the most flexible and forward-thinking approaches. Thank you Diego, for the way you represent One Contoso and for promoting this collective effort externally to help others.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "7f718435-ee4d-431c-bdbf-9c4ff326f46e", "instanceId": "c0fe613d-d6a2-49d5-9c17-403777fa3e43", "title": "People", "description": "Display selected people and their profiles", "dataVersion": "1.3", "properties": {"layout":2,"persons":[{"id":"DiegoS@M365x781559.OnMicrosoft.com","role":"HR Manager"}],"title":""}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{"persons[0].name":"Diego Siciliani","persons[0].email":"DiegoS@M365x781559.OnMicrosoft.com"},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Here are the topics Diego covered in his talk:​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

➜ Sustain productivity

➜ Communicate and collaborate with your team 

➜ Create community and culture

➜ Practice good data privacy and security measures

➜ Create a hybrid work plan for the organization

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Contoso Marketing took a risk for big rewards

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "f117d2ad-e399-4c84-b025-078defe6329e", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The Contoso Marketing team identified a problem - team members needed more uninterrupted focus time in order to do their best work. Initially, no meeting Fridays started as an experiment that many questioned if it was the right decision since it had never been done before.

During the experimental period, people reported better productivity and well being. Meanwhile, overall meeting volume decreased and people came to rely on other asynchronous ways of working together. I want to applaud Marketing's ability to listen to their colleagues and use hybrid workplace values–like flexibility–in finding the right solution for their team. No meeting Fridays is a best practice other team's at Contoso should consider.

"No meeting Friday's have allowed my team and I to honor the inherent need we all have for uninterrupted thinking time to do our best work. It has also forced team members to be really selective as to when meeting's are actually required, and to rely on asynchronous collaboration methods as a substitute when possible."

Marketing Director, Lee Gu

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Going above and beyond

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "f117d2ad-e399-4c84-b025-078defe6329e", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":16}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
January's hybrid workplace champion is Megan Bowen!

Not only is Megan a hybrid workplace champion but she's also the Marketing manager for Contoso. Megan has lead the way for the entire marketing department by ensuring hybrid workplace practices are adopted where they make the most impact and that people in her organization have time blocked off on their calendars to take hybrid workplace training and attend events.
🏆 Thank you Megan for helping others see what's possible! 🏆​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: See what it takes to be champion of the month:​​​

➜ Coordinated and led an event series on how to engage audiences in hybrid meetings.

➜ Reduced the amount of meetings in the marketing department by 15% in favor of asynchronous collaboration methods .

➜ Tirelessly helped her colleagues use our hybrid work tools in several one-on-one sessions.

We recommend you that you complete all three training modules, tasks, and quizzes to ensure you've got the right tools and information to be successful in the hybrid workplace.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Hybrid work training modules
To help you develop hybrid workplace habits and discover new tools that ensure your well-being, productivity, and security.

➜ Well-being and productivity: Be intentional about modes of communication, make the most of your meetings, schedule breaks, and plan work/life boundaries.

➜ Collaboration and meetings: Run effective hybrid meetings, learn how to create more inclusive meeting environments, and how to co-author and collaborate on shared content.

➜ Security and data protection: Identify common cybersecurity threats in the workplace and learn how to protect sensitive personal, customer, or company data.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Use M365 Learning Pathways

Site customization guidance:

Use M365 Learning pathways to create customizable training playlists and use on-demand and Microsoft-maintained training playlists, including the hybrid work training modules. Learn more about how to set up and customize M365 Learning pathways to display hybrid workplace training content.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: BUILD IN BREAKS
Schedule reoccurring breaks throughout your day to meditate, stretch, or take a break from screen time. Consider taking certain meetings  by phone while on a walk.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: SCHEDULE FOCUS TIME
Proactively managing your schedule is now more important than ever. Look ahead on your calendar for blocks of time that can be reserved for work that requires focus.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: SET AND SHARE YOUR STATUS
Use away messages in Outlook and set your status in Teams to help others understand your working hours and when to expect a response.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: COMMUNICATE INTENTIONALLY
Consider what communications should be in an email, meeting, or a quick chat in Teams. Consider meetings that can be replaced using asynchronous communication methods.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "fdd38e66-56c1-44ca-97e1-923aa307a7a2", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Maximize your internet bandwidth

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "3b85d335-0e67-46c2-a551-96aeb482044a", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"best-connection.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"42ccf05a-5e7a-461c-9a25-96c540c2d8a2","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/best-connection.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"42ccf05a-5e7a-461c-9a25-96c540c2d8a2","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: USE YOUR BEST CONNECTION
Use a wired connection when possible. Wireless connections depend on the distance between the router and physical obstacles, like walls, that impacts connection quality.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "a08892f4-5031-48e5-92c5-26f617f7337f", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"up-to-date-equipment.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"938492ec-2d31-4b2b-a35a-2a6e80325f70","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/32981-up-to-date-equipment.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"938492ec-2d31-4b2b-a35a-2a6e80325f70","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: PRIORITIZE UP-TO-DATE EQUIPMENT
Reboot your home router when experiencing poor connectivity. If your router is more than five years old, you may want to consider replacing it.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "befb21aa-82a3-45b6-b4c7-acb86eb4d08f", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female wearing headphones working on a Surface laptop","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"test-speed.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"85c95f2a-b498-47c0-9791-926a0bb6b68d","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/test-speed.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"85c95f2a-b498-47c0-9791-926a0bb6b68d","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: TEST YOUR INTERNET SPEED
Run an internet speed test to determine your internet's connectivity score. If your connection score is strong but you are still experiencing issues, contact the help desk.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "0bd22c1b-37dd-4697-8242-a6776544bf7d", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a male reviewing his Microsoft Teams calendar","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"bandwidth.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"10dd5913-c70b-49f6-bf66-a1086bbf3a26","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/45851-bandwidth.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"10dd5913-c70b-49f6-bf66-a1086bbf3a26","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: CONSIDER BANDWIDTH USAGE
Avoid scheduling important meetings during time frames that members in your household may be using significant internet bandwidth for work or school. ​

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "d8a462af-d90e-498c-b4cb-3d9eb1c33e56", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Privacy protection
​​​​​​​at home

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "f5723d06-9ecc-4f8b-9ef5-b0acd69c1ace", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female using a mega phone ","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"overshare-aware.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"f9c77921-8142-404d-be8c-8a251012497b","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/overshare-aware.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"f9c77921-8142-404d-be8c-8a251012497b","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: BE OVERSHARE AWARE
Lock your devices when stepping away from them. Do not access or store personal data on shared and family devices or personal cloud storage.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "4aaa3516-73cf-4e1b-b847-0b6cbf0e821b", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female following privacy policies","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"back-to-basics.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"090302ad-7cc8-486a-8bb8-767601d9079e","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/back-to-basics.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"090302ad-7cc8-486a-8bb8-767601d9079e","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: GO BACK TO THE BASICS
Ensure you are following basic data privacy company policies around data retention, content classification, who can access data, and where data is stored.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "d8c6af63-c745-4f92-9abb-f455fc59b977", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female and male having a conversation","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"bring-in-experts.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"3cfde6f4-53f2-4d2a-b9c3-a2c29dd7378a","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/23570-bring-in-experts.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"3cfde6f4-53f2-4d2a-b9c3-a2c29dd7378a","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: BRING IN THE EXPERTS
Consult with your privacy team when in doubt who can help you work through your data and security questions or concerns.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "d2144d97-c18e-4987-b616-feeac05f9a79", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female approving paperwork","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"report-concerns.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"89d52709-56be-4c68-92ca-b1c09ef547da","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/report-concerns.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"89d52709-56be-4c68-92ca-b1c09ef547da","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: REPORT CONCERNS
Report privacy issues, incidents, suspicions, or concerns with your privacy team. If you see something, say something.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "c3b69d19-e286-4619-bf9f-57b802e8f2ed", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":32}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Inclusive hybrid meetings

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "336139ae-396c-44d5-a5e0-6dbbb595f964", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a Microsoft Teams calls showing accessibility","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"make-it-accessible.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"b4274f2a-b24f-495b-901e-ca1691c8d608","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/make-it-accessible.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"b4274f2a-b24f-495b-901e-ca1691c8d608","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: MAKE CONTENT ACCESSIBLE
Securely store content in the cloud to ensure shared content can be accessed by team members during meetings and on any device.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "2089d848-250a-4631-adf4-9ab1dc2bad0d", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a male using his laptop on a couch with his cat in the background","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"minimize-distractions.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"dc5ed08c-93af-4ab0-a7ea-7a2df1166459","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/34380-minimize-distractions.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"dc5ed08c-93af-4ab0-a7ea-7a2df1166459","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: MINIMIZE DISTRACTIONS
Reduce background noise and visual distractions to help team members focus during meetings.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "f558d096-265d-4898-8ede-c2d38d9e2241", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration demonstrating teammates taking turn speaking on a call.","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"take-turns-speaking.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"0a8b2ad0-211b-4755-a6c7-8e37f1d543c1","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/take-turns-speaking.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"0a8b2ad0-211b-4755-a6c7-8e37f1d543c1","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: TAKE TURNS SPEAKING
Decide at the beginning of hybrid meetings the preferred way of speaking in the meeting to make sure everyone gets a chance to share their ideas.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "d1d91016-032f-456d-98a4-721247c305e8", "instanceId": "c743512b-27a2-4de6-addf-502324701de1", "title": "Image", "description": "Add an image, picture or photo to your page including text overlays and ability to crop and resize images.", "dataVersion": "1.9", "properties": {"imageSourceType":2,"captionText":"","altText":"Illustration of a female walking her dog chatting on Teams mobile.","linkUrl":"","overlayText":"","fileName":"consider-timezones.svg","siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"ae4129d3-04e7-495f-8222-463fc402718e","imgWidth":760,"imgHeight":428,"alignment":"Center","fixAspectRatio":false,"isFullWidth":false}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{"imageSource":"{site}/SiteAssets/SitePages/Quick-tips/consider-timezones.svg"},"links":{},"customMetadata":{"imageSource":{"siteId":"{sitecollectionid}","webId":"{siteid}","listId":"{listid:Site Assets}","uniqueId":"ae4129d3-04e7-495f-8222-463fc402718e","width":760,"height":428}}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: CONSIDER TIME ZONES
Check working hours for team members in different time zones. Consider setting up asynchronous communication channels that benefit all team members.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
TRANSFORMING TO A HYBRID WORKPLACE​​​​​​​

Helping you work when and where you're at your best

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: In preparation for returning to the office, we will help you adopt hybrid workplace practices to ensure your health, over all well-being, and success. Over the next several months we will adopt new workplace habits, skills, and policies that ensure we can continue doing our best work in a more flexible way for all of you. Your health and well-being is our top concern, and you will see we have invested in learning from people within our organization and industry experts to develop training resources and a support network to ensure your success.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "f70bdf9c-04ef-4863-962f-1eaca4725153", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: The world has changed, and now the way we work together will change too. ​​​​​​​
More than ever, we must be flexible and forward-thinking in our approach to how we get work done at Contoso. Over the next several months, we will transform to a hybrid workplace model.

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "8654b779-4886-46d4-8ffb-b5ed960ee986", "instanceId": "07217723-ce67-43bb-b5a8-961f1528c917", "title": "Spacer", "description": "Add vertical space between areas on the page.", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"autoHide":true,"height":28}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{},"imageSources":{},"links":{}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Hybrid workplace factors will impact how we:​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

➜ Sustain productivity

➜ Communicate and collaborate with your team 

➜ Create community and culture

➜ Practice good data privacy and security measures

➜ Create a hybrid work plan with your manager

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What's next
Let Compass guide you through our transition to a hybrid workplace.

Compass is a personal assistant tool designed to keep you on track as you adopt and grow your hybrid workplace skillset. Compass is an app in Microsoft Teams that will automatically appear in the Teams app bar.​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: COMPASS: YOUR PERSONAL ASSISTANT
​​​​​​​To ensure you have the support you need to be successful, Compass will act as your personal assistant by:

➜ Sharing reminders for upcoming events

​​​​​​​➜ Tracking your training courses and tasks

​​​​​​​➜ Keeping you updated with the latest information

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: What you'll learn

We've worked closely with internal partners and experts to curate training, resources, and a support network to ensure you've got the tools you need to reach your goals.
